name: Terminal (itch) (LoudlyCloudy)
description:
Use a terminal to interact with this weird world that may or may not be in your own head.

Controls:

  • WASD+Mouselook,
  • Space to jump,
  • Left Click to pick up the Terminal
  • Tab to Open the Terminal
  • Up/down arrows to go to previous terminal entries (little broken)
  • You can ctrl+c and ctrl+v text

I used this funky cover of Ludwig, the Holy Blade

Also tracks from Mr. Robot
